channel.title: 317 Delta - Skilling Area
channel.description: I need help making a skilling place. My source is delta and it is 317. How do i spawn object rune ore, how do i get people to get rune when they mine it, and all that type of stuff? And where do i put this all - client.java? And where can i get a list of objects that has tree id's, ore id's, furnace id's? And all that. Thanks.

item.title: 317 Delta - Skilling Area
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

if(command.startsWith("")) { toX = ####; toY = ####; }

and to spawn objects use your spawnglobalobjects() { method.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Delta - Skilling Area

item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“Varied, post:3, topic:392481”]But how do I make it so people can chop wood from a tree, get logs when they cut, and get xp when they cut/chop the wood?[/quote]if it’s a delta source it should already be able to do that.

@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

spawnglobalobject - for spawning objects, search for it in client.java

For some id’s - http://www.runelocus.com/
